data.text: @sh33p_purple I've always used something like a tomato and roasted garlic sauce to add a bit of punch to it. Cured meats on top go super well, cos cheese loves them :D let me know how you get on with it

@sh33p_purple There's no resting involved. Quite the opposite. You have to work it all quickly or the cheese in the base starts to set again. 30 minutes from starting to measure stuff out to having it on the plate ready 👍

@sh33p_purple Yeppers. Almond flour, grated mozzarella, parmasan, cream cheese and salt. Mix it up. Add an egg, mix, form the base, bake for 15 minutes, add toppings and bake for further 5 minutes, sorted :D
Now I'm getting hungry...
@sh33p_purple Last normal pizza I had was 18 months ago. I make my own these days, cheese based base, is called fat head pizza. So fricking tasty :D

@sh33p_purple Ooh lucky :D
I should probably think about what I'm gonna eat...

@sh33p_purple People lol
Best laid plans and all
They love fucking me up
Tomorrow's a new day though
Probably the same outcomes as all prior

How are you then, sunshine?
